00045 /*
00046  * Can this object read the file
00047  */
00048 bool GCOSCELDataAdapter::CanReadFile()
00049 {
00050         bool canRead = gcosCel.ReadHeader();
00051         gcosCel.Close();
00052         return canRead;
00053 }

00136 /*
00137  */
00138 void GCOSCELDataAdapter::GetParameters(FusionTagValuePairTypeList& values)
00139 {
00140         FusionTagValuePairType tvp;
00141         int count = gcosCel.GetNumberAlgorithmParameters();
00142         for (int i=0; i<count; ++i)
00143         {
00144                 tvp.Tag = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosCel.GetAlgorithmParameterTag(i));
00145                 tvp.Value = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosCel.GetAlgorithmParameter(gcosCel.GetAlgorithmParameterTag(i).c_str()));
00146                 tvp.DetailedType().SetName(tvp.Tag);
00147                 tvp.DetailedType().SetValueText(tvp.Value);
00148                 values.push_back(tvp);
00149         }
00150 }
00151

00159 /*
00160  * Get the grid coordinates.
00161  */
00162 affymetrix_fusion_io::FGridCoords GCOSCELDataAdapter::GetGridCorners()
00163 {
00164         affymetrix_fusion_io::FGridCoords grid;
00165         GridCoordinatesType gct = gcosCel.GetGridCorners();
00166 
00167         grid.upperleft.x = gct.upperleft.x;
00168         grid.upperleft.y = gct.upperleft.y;
00169         grid.upperright.x = gct.upperright.x;
00170         grid.upperright.y = gct.upperright.y;
00171         grid.lowerright.x = gct.lowerright.x;
00172         grid.lowerright.y = gct.lowerright.y;
00173         grid.lowerleft.x = gct.lowerleft.x;
00174         grid.lowerleft.y = gct.lowerleft.y;
00175 
00176         return grid;
00177 }

00202 // Accessors for intensity information.
00203 /*
00204  */
00205 void GCOSCELDataAdapter::GetEntry(int index, FusionCELFileEntryType &entry)
00206 {
00207         CELFileEntryType gcosEntry;
00208         gcosCel.GetEntry(index, gcosEntry);
00209         CopyGCOSEntryToCalvin(gcosEntry, entry);
00210 }
00211 
00212 /*
00213  */
00214 void GCOSCELDataAdapter::GetEntry(int x, int y, FusionCELFileEntryType &entry)
00215 {
00216         CELFileEntryType gcosEntry;
00217         gcosCel.GetEntry(x, y, gcosEntry);
00218         CopyGCOSEntryToCalvin(gcosEntry, entry);
00219 }

00347 /*
00348  */
00349 void GCOSCELDataAdapter::CopyGCOSEntryToCalvin(const CELFileEntryType& source, FusionCELFileEntryType& target)
00350 {
00351         target.Intensity = source.Intensity;
00352         target.Stdv = source.Stdv;
00353         target.Pixels = source.Pixels;
00354 }
